Nexmo & OAuth

Nexmo now supports OAuth access for accounts, allowing developers & applications to act on behalf of users.

Browse OAuth Examples

Documentation

Complete documentation can be found on our site.

OAuth.net also provides a getting started guide.

Examples

This example repository currently contains a simple PHP script using OAuth to get a Nexmo account's current balance.

Mobile Messaging. Solved.
